name: Dragon x Dragon 2 Complete Version
summary: In addition to beautiful graphics, the mini-game floor is further enhanced, and the original version of the distribution in other carriers includes scenarios, episodes, productions, and emotional expressions cut for the convenience of capacity, and the details are enriched. There is. Strengthening the production of the battle system, and while inheriting the "nurturing limit system" which is a feature of the Dragon X Dragon 2 original version (50KB version), it is also possible to "grow by experience". The appearance of the new character Nahot tribe who gives items, and other elements after clearing the temple are also fully packed. You can enjoy the world of "dragon x dragon" more deeply through the fun of advancing the adventure while solving the mystery and the active battle scene. " In "Dragon x Dragon 2 Complete Version", the final boss character "2nd form" will appear, which did not appear in the original version.
